exceptions.tactic: intros pr I ii z s1 s2 H.
intros pr' I ii z s1 s2 H.
intros pr' I' ii z s1 s2 H.
intros pr' I' ii' z s1 s2 H.
intros pr' I' ii' z' s1 s2 H.
intros pr' I' ii' z' s1' s2 H.
intros pr' I' ii' z' s1' s2' H.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: intros pr I ii z s1 s2 H. unfold network_rely in *. destruct H as [n H]. exists n. revert H. induction n. - intros H. inversion H. subst. apply Idle. split; auto. - intros H. destruct H as [z' [s3 [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists z', s3. split. + apply H1. + apply (rely_trans (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s3 s2). * exists n; auto. * apply IHn; auto.
